name: Green Lentil and Zucchini Soup
author: Eric Poston
summary: I love lentils and always am looking for new ways to have them. With a garden full of zucchinis, this recipe was a no-brainer; one of our favorite staples. It is even good served cold on hot days.
ingredients: 2 cups ditalini pasta, or more to taste
directions: Mix zucchini, onion, and carrots in a bowl
Add enough water to cover and soak for 15 minutes; drain
Heat butter in a large stockpot over high heat; cook and stir zucchini, onion, carrots, garlic powder, and Italian seasoning until onion is transparent, about 7 minutes
Add tomatoes and beef bouillon to zucchini mixture; cook and stir until heated through, about 7 minutes
Mix water, lentils, and ditalini pasta into zucchini mixture; reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until pasta is tender, 20 to 30 minutes
